segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall and it's going to be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being very sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet and careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is both amusing and a bit terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
